0.0: Gain the Jade-Forged Crown effect when using an Elemental Skill: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by <cryo>0.6%</cryo> for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of <cryo>16%</cryo>.
